dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare enter our domain, puny creature. What brings you here?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to challenge the might of the forest trolls!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hah! A foolish decision. Prepare to face the consequences of your arrogance.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am ready to face whatever challenges you throw at me!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Brave words, but courage alone won't save you from the wrath of the forest. Prepare for a battle you won't forget.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will fight with all my strength!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. The forest trolls will show no mercy in combat. Prepare for your ultimate test!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense your power. Let us form an alliance and work together.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Alliance? We have no need for weak allies. You shall face the forest trolls alone.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I realize my mistake. I will leave your domain in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise decision. Do not return, lest you wish to tempt fate once more.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace. I wish to learn more about the forest trolls.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Such words are foreign to the forest trolls. What do you seek to gain from us?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek knowledge and understanding of your ways.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Curious... very well, listen carefully, outsider. The forest trolls are not to be trifled with.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I appreciate your wisdom. Thank you for sharing.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Take what knowledge you have gained and leave. The forest trolls have no more to offer you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Is there a way for us to coexist peacefully?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Coexist? The forest trolls have no need for outsiders disturbing our domain. Leave now.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek no harm. I only wish to admire the strength of the forest trolls.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Harmless admiration? Your words ring hollow. What is your true purpose here?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I assure you, my intentions are pure. I mean no harm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your words are meaningless. Leave before the forest trolls decide to take action against you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If it offends you, I will leave immediately.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Offense is the least of your worries if you linger here. Begone, outsider!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come bearing gifts as a sign of goodwill. May we talk peacefully?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Gifts? Peaceful talk? The forest trolls have no need for such offerings. State your true purpose.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer these gifts as a token of respect. Let us converse and learn from each other.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect? The forest trolls demand obedience, not gifts. Choose your next words carefully.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to understand and respect your ways. Please, let us communicate peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Understanding is beyond your reach. The forest trolls have no interest in idle chatter. Leave now.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see my offerings are in vain. I will leave you in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your understanding is belated. Leave now, before the forest trolls decide to take action against you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If my gifts are not welcome, then I will depart your domain.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise choice. The forest trolls have no patience for outsiders. Leave now.
